nodes.text: Vandos was a planet located in the Vandos system of the Outer Rim Territories. It was controlled by the Separatists during the Clone Wars.

In 20 BBY, the Galactic Republic sent Jedi Knights Jmmaar, Flynn Kybo and his Master T'chooka D'oon, along with a battalion of clone troopers, to rescue Ambassador Quiyyen from Separatist forces here.

It turned out to be a trap, as they were ambushed by General Grievous, flanked by tens of B2 super battle droids. T'chooka D'oon and Jmmaar were killed in the assault, but Flynn Kybo was able to escape with Quiyyen, bringing him safely back to the Republic.
